Including something like James "The Angry Video Game Nerd" Rolfeâ€™s "Rocky Jumped a Park Bench," a touching, heartfelt guided tour through various sites in Philly where the series was shot, would have been a great inclusion. Or providing fans with the scores of deleted/alternate scenes from "Rocky V" (which are currently available on YouTube) or a Director's Cut of that film. Unfortunately, MGM misses the opportunity. Even the easter egg from the "Rocky V" DVD is missing.
